title: The New Queue?
body:
Sorry if this is in the wrong spot, but I checked the discussions and they seemed to line up.
Anyway. I apologise for this, but I am extremely frustrated.

When in hell is the new queue coming to OCE!? I've heard nothing about it for MONTHS! And don't you dare give me some obscure answer. I looked it up and all I could find was a load of steaming bull about it coming during 'launch' or within a 'few weeks'. But nothing has EVER happened! I swear, we always get left behind here, and what's so hard about implementing it in one region and not in another? Hell, I don't even know if it's still up in NA.
I say this because I just got landed with an absolutely idiotic team which never would've happened with this new system. PLEASE tell me the project hasn't been abandoned and PLEASE tell me it's coming. Don't screw me over here, Riot.
 {{summoner:14}}

replies.body:
If your referring to the Normal Draft mode I don't think that comes out for another several months and that's only if the OCE community is big enough to support another permanent game mode.

But I'm not 100% sure that we get normal draft mode.

I meant the new one they showcased awhile back. Dynamic Queue. Upon looking it up though, I realise it was poorly received.
EDIT: Never mind, I still want it. Come on Riot.
The new dynamic que is for ranked games only at the moment.
But why can't it be for normals as well? I don't play a lot, if any, ranked.
When, if we get normal draft mode I believe that is getting the dynamic que.
